modName: More Evil Mace of Molagbal now with more blood
summary: A retexture of the Mace of Molagbal to make it look more EVIL!
descriptionHtml:
The texture on the Mace of Molagbal needed to be more evil looking in my opinion.

I tried to keep it stock as possible on the retexture, so I only changed the levels and painted brighter eyes with added glow effect. The levels change brings out the edges more while making it look less bright.

If anyone wants a version with blood stains. Let me know and I will make one.

Note: Diffuse map only. I haven\'t altered the normal.

Edit 1: Added bloody version
author: EvilMrSatan

files.name: More Evil More Bloody Mace of Molagbal
files.fileName: More Evil More Bloody Mace of Molagbal-1137-V-1.zip
